Returns: A list of user-facing messages about payment instruments used to fund the Google Wallet transaction.
getPaymentDescriptions().Description: Returns an array of strings used for user-facing messaging about payment instruments used for funding this Google Wallet transaction. Do not attempt to parse the contents of this array as the format, contents and length may change at any time. IMPORTANT: This list is sorted in the order of how messages should be displayed. You are required to show each of these sources to inform the buyer of their funding sources for the transaction. See Google Wallet UI guide for details. Each payment description is not guaranteed to match a consistent pattern and you should not try to parse this data. See @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#FullWallet#getInstrumentInfos_E@ for a stable API of instrument information.

Returns: Google's unique identifier for this transaction, will be identical to the value passed in @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#FullWalletRequest_E@.
An optional merchant identifier for this transaction, will be identical to the value passed in @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#FullWalletRequest_E@
Billing address associated with the payment instrument.

writeToParcel(android.os.Parcel, int).FullName: public void writeToParcel (Parcel out, int flags)

Returns: the billing address associated with the buyer's payment instrument
The one-time credit card to use for payment processing
list of instrument info (if available), otherwise null.
getInstrumentInfos().Description: Returns an array of finer grained details about the instruments used in this Google Wallet transaction. Details here can be parsed and used for customer support, etc..., but NOTE: This list of details is not guaranteed to have the same ordering or length as @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#FullWallet#getPaymentDescriptions_E@.

ClassDesc: Parcelable representing a full wallet response.
